brics_3d::ParameterSet Class Reference

A ParameterSet holds a number of parameters, representing (name/value) pairs. More...

Detailed Description

A ParameterSet holds a number of parameters, representing (name/value) pairs.

std::string brics_3d::ParameterSet::pack ( )

Packs this ParameterSet into one string.

An XML notation is used to separate multiple parameters that are to be packed.

Definition at line 175 of file ParameterSet.cpp.

References hasParam().

Here is the call graph for this function:

bool brics_3d::ParameterSet::unpack ( const std::string &  param)

Unpacks the given string into a whole ParameterSet, with all unpacked parameters entered into this set.

The ParameterSet must possess an XML based form. Returns true if param could be succesfully unpacked.
